ETYMOLOGY: From Latin simul ('at the same time') + the adjectival suffix -taneus (as in 'spontaneous').

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: An adjective is a word naming an attribute of a noun, used to describe the noun.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Occurring or operating at the same time.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 同时发生的；同步的；同时进行的
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The start of the race and the firing of the gun were simultaneous.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 比赛开始和发令枪响是同时的。
